price: Ntumwa y’Imana! Ibuka n’igihe Twebwe Allah, Twabwiriza abamalayika hamwe na Ibilisi Duti: “Nimwubamire Adamu mumuhe icubahiro kimukwiye”; abamalayika baraheza baragamburuka barubama, kiretse Ibilisi yanse kumwubamira.
arabic: وَإِذۡ قُلۡنَا لِلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ ٱسۡجُدُواْ لِأٓدَمَ فَسَجَدُوٓاْ إِلَّآ إِبۡلِيسَ أَبَىٰ

meta.transliteration: wa-idh qul'nā lil'malāikati us'judū liādama fasajadū illā ib'līsa abā
